title: Fractal: A simple (and highly inefficient) fractal viewer written in Qt
description:
As a fun little exercise to better understand how fractals (in particular [Julia fractals](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Julia_set#Quadratic_polynomials)) work, Lorenz and I implemented a simple renderer in Qt.  
The code is deliberately kept simple and doesn't implement any optimizations other than painting in a background thread.
